analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/34/0xfe211f86be5de898c9ebffe2c2b1d49ee8460b7f.sol:
	Contract GMCToken has payable functions:
	 - sendGift (/unique_chucks/34/0xfe211f86be5de898c9ebffe2c2b1d49ee8460b7f.sol#227-238)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
